replies.body:
{{champion:24}} Brothers the time is now to put an end to the hoard for the Wardens!

{{champion:15}} {{champion:43}} Ahem

{{champion:24}} and sisters.(arrow flies past head) What the heck!

{{champion:22}} Dang that stupid dodge.

{{champion:43}} It's the marauders.

{{champion:2}} Wardens prepare for your pillaging and burning.

{{champion:15}} How many times do we have to tell you, we shall never be defeated.
 
{{champion:12}} You wardens can't win forever and when we do we shall control the sandbox.

{{champion:114}} Students 15 more minutes and then you have to come inside.

{{champion:19}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:24}} Yes head mistress.

{{champion:24}} Anyway we always have one step ahead of you savage animals.

{{champion:19}} First off rude second times have changed, for nautilus is out sick today.

{{champion:15}} No matter wardens charge!

{{champion:22}} Marauders kill, but make it clean at least please.

{{champion:111}} (Inside the nurses office looking out the window) *cough* Wooh go wardens.*cough*

3 minutes later

{{champion:101}} Guys hurry up the sandbox is waiting- what the(looking at battle)

{{champion:19}} Stop cheating Jax this is the 5th time you crited in a row

{{champion:24}} Lamp smash! Another Lamp Smash! More Lamp smashing!

{{champion:101}} God dang it Kha this is why we shouldn't stay for seconds in the cafeteria. We lose the sandbox.

{{champion:121}} Can you blame me the cafeteria had tater tots today.

_Meanwhile..._
{{champion:103}} ~~sigh~~ Look how much fun everyone's having.
{{champion:122}} Ha! I'd wreak the other team HARD!
{{champion:245}} Whos side would you be on?
{{champion:122}} Who cares! I just wanna FIGHT!
{{champion:103}} Isn't that why you're in detention Darius?
{{champion:122}} Hey my bro had it coming. HE STOLE MY GIRLFRIEND FOR PETE SAKES!  
{{champion:13}} That's enough, you guy still have detention so you can't go outsi...HEY YOU! DON'T YOU DARE TRY TO ESCAPE WITH POOL OF BLOOD! HEY GET BACK HERE!
{{champion:103}} So bail?
{{champion:245}} {{champion:122}} Bail.

{{champion:53}}: Halt you shall not pass
{{champion:103}}: Blitz, what are you doing?
{{champion:53}}: I am the designated hall monitor and teacher assistant, I have been told by Professor Ryze to keep you in hear
{{champion:122}}: (Pushes him aside) stupid robot, you can't stop-
{{champion:53}}: No! (Throws his grab) You must stay.
{{champion:245}}: Aaaaaah, your such a buzz kill.
{{champion:53}}: Buzzing is a sound, it lacks in vital organs, it cannot be killed.
{{champion:245}}: ...
{{champion:53}}: Recalculating... bluff required, Your childish remarks do not faze me
{{champion:103}}: (grinning) but your just so boring, can't you just let us out for a little bit.
{{champion:122}}: I'll only kill the insects
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}}: Pleeeeeeeaaaaase!
{{champion:53}}: considering...
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}}: (Smiling)
{{champion:53}}: processing
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}} (Smile even wider)
{{champion:53}}: Final result... denied
{{champion:103}}: Buzz kill, you can go-
{{champion:53}}: SILENCE!!!
1 hour later
{{champion:13}}: All right Vladmere you better not try to run again. Thank you for keeping it so quiet Blitzcrank
{{champion:53}}: Thank you I will go now (Walks out)
{{champion:13}}: Alright, now what did we learn today kids
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}}:.... (Annoyed)
{{champion:13}}: What's with the sudden silence
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}}: Looks at him with the most WTF face ever)
{{champion:13}}: I will not except attitude, if their is a problem you need to tell me.
{{champion:245}}: (sighs, then Points up)
{{champion:13}}: (Looking where Ekko pointed) oh... your silenced.
{{champion:103}}, {{champion:245}}, {{champion:122}}: (Annoyed, they nod their heads)
{{champion:13}}: Well I hope you learned your lesson then.

{{champion:8}} HA! What a bunch of lo-
{{champion:114}} Mr.Vladimir, I've been talking to our janitor Yordick and we have decided to take you out of detention..
{{champion:8}} ALRIGHT! See you suckers later! (get's stop by Headmistress Fiora)
{{champion:114}} Ahem, we have decided to take you out of detention and have you help Yordick clean for the rest of the week, starting with the mess you made trying to escape detention.
{{champion:8}} **WHAT!**
{{champion:103}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:245}} ~~snickers~~

Roll up in ball?: {{champion:33}} Ok.
Time to go eat?: {{champion:223}} Buffet.
"Do I look fat in this dress?": {{champion:64}} Can't say.

{{champion:268}} /{{champion:89}} bot lane is a must now.

These 750 RP skins actually have new animations...
Back in my day, if you wanted new animations you had to buy Nunu Bot.

2. C. A great way to feed your overinflated ego by bullying people with less money and influence.
3. C. The most expensive suit you can find to remind everyone, for the 10000th time, that you're really rich.

Congratulations, the test is complete! It’s time to calculate your results…

You're Donald Trump.

Lore and just character wise in general warden does not fit karma at all.. And she needs a high tier skin besides order of the lotus.
These are AU skinlines, they don't have to fit Karma's lore. Likewise if ever there were to be an "evil" Karma skin, don't you think an overzealous Judge makes the cut pretty well?

A sick and elderly man asks you to help him fold his laundry. Do you:
A) Annihilate him for folding his laundry in a non-designated zone
B) Annihilate him and burn down his village
C) Put bucket over his head and steal his clothes, who gives a f*ck about Daedric sh*t anyways?
All 3 of my answers were B... I feel like im a great person xD
Neither.. I'm neither. I have no RP.

If the majority of  your answers are B, then you're a Marauder.
